response.overview: Roberta Flack's iconic album, "Killing Me Softly", is a masterpiece of soulful expression and emotional depth. Released in 1973, the album features the unforgettable title track, "Killing Me Softly with His Song," which showcases Flack's rich, emotive voice and her ability to convey profound feeling through music.  The album also includes other timeless tracks like "Jesse" and "No Tears (In the End)," each contributing to the album's status as a beloved classic in the realms of soul and R&B. This Blu-ray Quadio edition is a must-have for audiophiles and fans of Roberta Flack, offering a fresh, enriched way to experience her groundbreaking music.  Now available for the first time in nearly 50 years with 192/24 Resolution Quadraphonic and Hi-Res Stereo Mixes.
response.title: Killing Me Softly - Quadio
